entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish not working with dependent projects #9879
  • Not easy to add a "AndroidResource" to a maui project and `Resource` is ambiguous #9877
    Backlog
  • WebView NavigationEvent is NewPage for Back or Forward #9875
    Backlog
  • Button/ImageButton's Border has a default value on Windows #9871
    Backlog
  • Exception occurs when using System.IO.Ports #9870
  • Big path images not loading on Android (infinity-loop, GC-free) #9867
    Backlog
  • Screenshot doesn't work on iOS #9866
    Backlog

Closed

  • [BUG ] The namespace is not being adhered to for the new content pages being created. #9488
  • After orientating the screen from portrait to landscape the data on screen is getting overlapped. #8607
    7.0-rc2
  • Namespace issue when referencing files in Platform folders #9876
  • .NET Maui Intellisense is super slow, Both C# in .CS and Blazor.razor .C#, 3 to 4 seconds hangs every type. #9770
  • DisplayAlert does not works in Windows, does in Android #9469
    Backlog
  • Strange entries in the .csproj #9869
  • Right click gesture recognizer #9140
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix crash using a Name in a GradientStop #9865
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high

Merged

  • [MacCatalyst] PointerGestureRecognizer Catalyst and iPad implementation #9861
    area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #9874
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #9872
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22429.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 #9873
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net6.0] Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore Packages to 6.0.8 #9863
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore Package Versions #9862
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump AspNet.Security.OAuth.Apple to 6.0.10 #9855
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.4.2.1 to 1.5.0 #9844
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9864
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Housekeeping] Added new Border samples to the Gallery #9676
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.7 to 1.7.0 #9845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #8347
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 7 Planning
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
